snippet.title: Little Nightmares II - Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Preparations are complete, little ones. Your journey to the Pale City begins any moment now. Once you take the first step, there's no going back. Take a breath and get ready to face what's waiting for you in the heart of the Signal Tower.
 
Get #LittleNightmares II on PlayStation 4, Xbox One, PC, Stadia, and Nintendo Switch: https://bnent.eu/LittleNightmaresII

Follow us on:
Twitter: https://twitter.com/LittleNights
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/little__nightmares
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/LittleNightmaresEU
Visit us: https://bnent.eu/LN
